middleware.type: { name: string; options?: any; fn: (state: { placement: Placement; strategy: Strategy; platform: Platform; x: number; y: number; initialPlacement: Placement; middlewareData: MiddlewareData; rects: ElementRects; elements: Elements; }) => Promisable<...>; }[]
middleware.description: Function to update the default middleware used to extend or replace it

open.description:
The `open` state of the floating element to synchronize with the
`isPositioned` value.

placement.description: Where to place the floating element relative to the reference element.

strategy.description: The strategy to use when positioning the floating element.

onOpenChange.type: (open: boolean, event?: Event, reason?: OpenChangeReason) => void
onOpenChange.description:
An event callback that is invoked when the floating element is opened or
closed.
